original_title: 人生初 絶頂、その向こう側へ 河北彩花
overview: What kind of expression, reaction, and appearance will you show if you continue to make Ayaka Kawakita to the limit? This work is a work that emphasizes the number of climaxes and density, and is thoroughly exploited. Release even stronger ecstasy at the end of repeated climaxes. The appearance of her having the best looks in the industry was so bewitching that it strongly encouraged our sexual excitement.
title: First time in my life, climax and beyond Ayaka Kawakita
